original_text: People among you accept bribes to kill somebody. When some of you lend money to people, you make them pay more money back to you. Some of you use your power to make people give you money. You people of Jerusalem have forgotten me. That is what the Lord says.
korean_text: 네 가운데에 피를 흘리려고 뇌물을 받는 자도 있었으며 네가 변돈과 이자를 받았으며 이익을 탐하여 이웃을 속여 빼앗았으며 나를 잊어버렸도다 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: When some of you lend money to people
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 어떤 사람들이 사람들에게 돈을 빌려줄 때

sentences.original_text: you make them pay more money back to you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그들이 더 많은 돈을 돌려주게 합니다

sentences.original_text: Some of you use your power
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 어떤 사람들은 너희의 권력을 사용합니다

sentences.original_text: to make people give you money
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 너희에게 돈을 주게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: You people of Jerusalem have forgotten me
That is what the Lord says
